author: vkhristenko
body:
this PR builds on top of 
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23466
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23386

for DataFormats/HcalRecHit
- add constexpr to HBHE / HO / HF RecHit 
- add constexpr to HBHEChannelInfo / HFPreRecHit / HFQIE10Info
- move impls to header (remove inline specifier for those that are marked as constexpr, those are inline implicitly)
- provide simple tests
- given that Hcal RecHit collections are edm::SortedCollection, shipping internals to the device is analogous to what was done in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23386 for digis

I assume that i will need to rebase this branch once prs that i depend on here will be integrated (hopefully)
title: Making Hcal Rec Hits cuda friendly
